name: Akasim Factory S Transfer Oil
description: Akasim Factory S Transfer Oil is blended from paraffinic base oils and an excellent additives package that provides heat transfer fluid for use in closed unpressurised heat transfer systems at temperatures ranging from 315 to 370 Â°C. The high quality of paraffinic oil possesses low vapor pressure selected for high levels of thermal stability and specific heat and thermal conductivity. It prevents the thermal cracking and chemical oxidation in the systems.
